Field Label: Scoring Procedure and Interpretation: *Brief WISDM subscale and Scoring procedure *Affiliative Attachment= Mean of items 11, 22, 26 *Automaticity= Mean of items 1, 10, 14, 25 *Loss of Control= Mean of items 2, 16, 21, 35 *Cognitive Enhancement= Mean of items 6, 13, 32 *Craving= Mean of items 4, 17, 23, 29 *Cue Exposure/Associative Processes= Mean of items 8, 12, 24 *Social/Environmental Goads= Mean of items 18, 27, 30 *Taste= Mean of items 5, 15, 20 *Tolerance= Mean of items 3, 28, 31, 36 *Weight Control= Mean of items 7, 19, 34 *Affective Enhancement= Mean of items 9, 33, 37 *Total Score= Sum of means for the 11 subscales. The scoring scheme reflects factors identified in the original publications. Factor structure may differ in individual studies.
